vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐγκρίνω [ῑ],
reckon in or among: reckon as, τίν᾽ ἄνδρ᾽ ἄριστον ἐγκρίναιεν ἄν; [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__2 of persons, select, admit, ἐ. ἢ συγκρ. [NT]:—passive, εἰς τὴν αἵρεσιν [Refs 5th c.BC+]; of ἔφηβοι, [Refs 3rd c.BC+]; of athletes, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]; ἐγκρινόμενος, ὁ, subject of statue by Alcamenes, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
__3 admit, accept, opposed to ἀποκρίνω, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; παλιγγενεσίαν [Refs 5th c.BC+]; regard as genuine, νομίσματα [Refs 5th c.BC+]; admit, sanction, e.g. an author as classical, [Refs]
__4 approue, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]; ἀριθμὸς ἐγκρίνεται is adopted, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]

relatedNos._zh_tw_Gloss: 在, 裡, 藉著, 靠 ...
relatedNos._zh_Gloss: 在, 里, 借着, 靠 ...

vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to classify
to judge, or reckon among, consider as belonging to, adjudge to the number of; class with, place in the same rank, 2Cor. 10:12*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: comparar or compararse con, igualarse con
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: đếm trong số; phán xét. thường được dịch bởi “so sánh mình với”. ἐν (G1722) + κρίνω (G2919).
